summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to capital facilities; authorizing and providing for the issuance of limited tax general obligation bonds in one or more series to provide the funds to pay for various City purposes and to pay costs of issuance of the bonds; providing for certain terms and covenants of the bonds; providing for the sale of the bonds; providing for agreements and activities in connection with proceeds of the bonds; and authorizing the creation of a Seattle Financial Management System Redevelopment Fund.
